name: Spell Arena
description:
-------------------------------

Controls :

WASD - movement

Left Mouseclick - shoot

Mouse Scrollwheel - switch magic color (visible on staff or top left corner)

Space - Dodge roll

-------------------------------

Submission for IndieTales Gamejam 2021.

Theme "One Room"

You play as a convicted sorcerer sentenced to battle demonic imps in an arena.

The Demons you fight come in 3 Colors. Red, Green and Blue

Every colour is always stronger against one and weak against the other.

Red demons are vulnerable to blue magic and can't be harmed by green.

Red is strong against green, green is strong against blue and vice versa.

Your goal is to survive as long as possible against increasingly stronger waves of enemies.
